thread.title: Ky. cop shot by gunman who barricaded himself inside home
thread.title_full: Ky. cop shot by gunman who barricaded himself inside home - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Ky. cop shot by gunman who barricaded himself inside home
text:
A police officer was shot in the chest Tuesday night by a gunman who barricaded himself inside an Eastern Kentucky home, according to reports.
Prestonsburg officer Adam Dixon was hit by an “active shooter” who was holed up in a house with a gun aimed outside early Wednesday, police told WYMT-TV . Officers blocked off the road and a SWAT team entered the area.
Dixon was stable at a hospital around 75 miles northeast in Huntington, W.V., after being airlifted from the scene, a local reporter Tweeted , citing sources from the Kentucky State Police. Officials with the state police didn’t immediately respond to a request for information on his injuries.
WYMT TV 11 News Det. Adam Dixon of the Prestonsburg Police Department talks in a 2014 interview with WYMT. Dixon was shot late Tuesday by a gunman who barricaded himself inside an area home, police told the local TV station. City of Prestonsburg, Kentucky Police Department via Facebook A file photo shows Prestonsburg Police Department cruisers. Officers in the Eastern Kentucky town were involved in a standoff with the suspect thought to have wounded Dixon early Wednesday. Previous Next Enlarge The local TV station interviewed Dixon, a detective, for a 2014 story about policing in the town of 3,300.
“We try to lead the way and try to set the example, so to speak, of what a small town community can be and where a small town community can go,” Dixon said.
